channel.title: Room Booking on PlaceOS
channel.description: Recent content in Room Booking on PlaceOS

item.title: ASHRAE Headquarters - Net-Zero Retrofit
item.description: ASHRAE is a global society maintaining sustainable standards for the built environment. They are the creator of BACnet, a protocol and set of standards for the HVAC industry.

item.title: Suncorp - Office downsize from three buildings to one
item.description: In preparation for their new office space, Suncorp recognized that they were not perceived as technology innovators and decided to take action. They embarked on a research mission to determine what their ideal technological infrastructure would look like, and then worked backward to identify which specific technologies would help them achieve that goal. Their ultimate objective was to create a system that could serve as the brain of their new building.

item.title: Building & Region-Level Workplace Management
item.description: Control workplace settings to standardize policies across buildings, so you can scale workplace management while ensuring the right settings for each location.

item.title: Room Booking Updates: Recurring Booking & Room Manager
item.description: Learn about the new recurring bookings feature in our room booking app. Streamline your scheduling process and enhance room management with ease.

item.title: September 2024 PlaceOS Product Updates
item.description: New WorkMate features: email templates, parking management, QR code printing, room alerts, and a media library in our September release.

item.title: Meeting Room Display Interface Design
item.description: Improve room booking efficiency with our advanced meeting room display. Explore interface design tips to create a user-friendly and effective booking system.

item.title: How to create a workplace worth returning to
item.description: In this piece, I’m going to discuss how the working environment has changed today and what you can do about it.

item.title: Integrating incentives into the workplace and beyond
item.description: Rewards programs aren’t new, but they typically haven’t extended into the physical work environment. Let’s change that.

item.title: LIVE DEMO: Energy Analytics Dashboards, Outlook Plugin & More
item.description: A live demonstration of our latest in Commercial Building Energy Analytics, our Outlook Plugin & workplace application.

item.title: LIVE DEMO: Enhanced Room Booking & Event Manager
item.description: Our latest webinar will be introducing some highly requested updates to our room booking experience & event manager

item.title: LIVE DEMO: Occupancy-Based Energy Automation
item.description: A live demonstration about Occupancy-Based Energy Automation, Our AI Roadmap & New Room Booking Features

item.title: New WorkMate Features: Experience Surveys, WFH Status & more
item.description: New features for our workplace suite, WorkMate, includes Experience Surveys, Resource Pay, WFH Status & Quick Booking.

item.title: When to go with a custom or packaged smart building solution
item.description: When it comes to smart building solutions, choosing when to go custom or packaged is difficult. Here’s how to approach it.
